senses.sense_definition: The study of the movements of the winds.

examples.text: She decided to pursue a career in <w>anemology</w> to research hurricane formation.
Modern <w>anemology</w> relies heavily on satellite data to track air currents.

senses.sense_definition: The wind movements in a particular region.

examples.text: The <w>anemology</w> of the island makes it a perfect location for wind farming.
Pilots must study the local <w>anemology</w> before flying through the mountain pass.
